attributes.action: Continue funding the play therapist course
attributes.additional_details: we need more play therapists desperately. People already on the course deserve to complete their training and many will not be able to do this if funding is cut
attributes.background: Continue funding for those already on the course so that they can continue their training. Stop funding once the current cohort have completed their course.

rejection.details: It is unclear what course(s) you are referring to, but in any case, course closures are a matter for the educational institution which operates the course, not for the UK Government or Parliament.
